```{r fitting sd}

data <- dfus %>% group_by(concept, color) %>% summarise(xbar = mean(rating), sample_sd = sd(rating), .groups = 'drop')

# fitting the function s = a * xbar * (1-xbar)
d1 <- data[1,]
start_a = d1$sample_sd / (d1$xbar *(1 - d1$xbar))
fit <- nls( sample_sd ~ a * xbar * (1-xbar), data = data, start = list(a = start_a))

summary(fit)

coef(fit)
```
